discourse_list.title: Advance Notice G&R Time Change Trial - May 26 and June 30

content.content: In collaboration, GovAlpha and GovComms plan to trial holding the weekly G&R call later at 21:00 UTC once monthly. We are planning to trial this new arrangement on the following two dates:  Thursday, May 26 Thursday, June 30  We hope this will allow MakerDAO contributors and MKR holders who live in time zones excluded by the current time of 17:00 UTC, particularly those in Oceania and East Asia, to attend and participate in the G&R call. The MakerDAO calls calendar has been updated to reflect this schedule change. We look forward to hearing feedback based on these meetings. If feedback is positive, we may look to make this a regular timeslot for the last G&R call of each month.  cc: @Core-Facilitators @GovAlpha-Core-Unit @gov-comms-core-unit @Recognized-Delegates
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
